predicate.note: Frames file for 'facilitate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'ease'.

example.name: nice -n- simple
example.text: Among other things, Mr. Bologna said that the sale will facilitate Gen-Probe's marketing of a diagnostic test for acquired immune deficiency syndrome, or AIDS.
example.arg: Gen-Probe's marketing of a diagnostic test for acquired immune deficiency syndrome, or AIDS
